```{r}
myflowSet<- read.flowSet(files = fcs.unzipped)
myflowSet.compensated <- compensate(myflowSet, exp_info$compensations$BJR$compensation_matrix)
myflowSet.gated <- lapply(as.list(myflowSet.compensated@frames), function(ff){
       gate_population(ff, "viable", exp_info, verbose = F)
  })
exp_info$populations


myflowSet.gated.us <- lapply(as.list(myflowSet.compensated@frames), function(ff){
       gate_population(ff, "intact", exp_info, verbose = F)
  })

#gate_population()
mydata.list <- lapply(myflowSet.gated, function(ff){
  as.tibble(exprs(ff)) %>%
    mutate(filename = description(ff)$GUID)}
  )

mydata.tidy <- 
  mydata.list %>%
  lapply(apply_scales, exp_info) %>%
  lapply(apply_panel, exp_info, "Panel 1") %>%
  lapply(clean_names, case = "old_janitor")

mydata.tidy


stained <- mydata.tidy$`Healthy Blood_Stained_020.fcs`
uptake <- mydata.tidy$`Healthy Blood_Uptake_021.fcs`
```

```{r}
h <- reticulate::import("hdbscan")

cl <- h$HDBSCAN(min_samples = 7L,
                min_cluster_size = 100L,
                algorithm= 'prims_kdtree')


stained.ss <- stained %>%
    sample_n(40e3)

stained.scaled.ss <- stained.ss %>%
  select(cd45, ssc_a, fsc_a) %>%
  mutate_all(rescale, c(0,7))

stained.ss.umap <- umap(stained.scaled.ss, n_neighbors = 30, 
                        min_dist = 0, verbose = T)

ggplot(as_tibble(stained.ss.umap),aes(x= V1, y = V2)) + 
  geom_point(shape = ".")

stained.ss.cl <- cl$fit_predict(stained.ss.umap)
unique(stained.ss.cl+ 1)
#stained.ss.cl2 <- cl$fit_predict(as.matrix(stained.scaled.ss))


as_tibble(stained.ss.umap) %>%
  mutate(cluster  = as.factor(stained.ss.cl + 1)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= V1, y = V2, col = cluster)) + 
  geom_point(shape = ".")

#unique(stained.ss.cl + 1)
mydata.stained.cl <- stained.ss %>%
  mutate(cluster = as.factor(stained.ss.cl + 1))
library(mda)
celltype.fda <- fda(cluster~fsc_a + ssc_a + cd45 + alexa750, method = earth,
                    data = mydata.stained.cl, 
                    keep.fitted=TRUE, keepxy = TRUE, 
                    dimension = 2, degree = 3)

#celltype.earth <- earth(cluster ~ fsc_a + ssc_a + cd45, data = mydata.stained.cl, 
 #                       degree = 2,trace = 1)
#stained
celltype.stained <- predict(celltype.fda, newdata = stained)
#celltype.stained2 <- predict(celltype.earth, newdata = stained)

#celltype.stained2.1<- apply(celltype.stained2, 1, which.max)
mydata.stained.cl %>%
  #mutate(celltype = celltype.stained) %>%
  #sample_n(100e3) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ssc_a, y = cd45, col = cluster)) + 
  geom_point(shape = ".")
stained  %>%
  mutate(celltype = as.factor(celltype.stained)) %>%
  sample_n(100e3) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ssc_a, y = cd45, col = celltype)) + 
  geom_point(shape = ".")
```

```{r}
#uptake.pb_750
uptake.mat <- as.matrix(uptake %>% select(pbx8, alexa750, ssc_a, fsc_a) %>%
                          mutate_all(rescale, c(0,7)))

uptake.cl <- cl$fit_predict(uptake.mat)
table(uptake.cl + 1)

labels <- uptake %>%
  mutate(celltype = factor(uptake.cl + 1, levels = c("2","3", "4", "1", "0"))) %>%
  mutate(celltype = fct_rev(celltype)) %>%  group_by(celltype) %>%
  select(fsc_a, ssc_a, pbx8, alexa750) %>%
  summarise_all(median) %>%
  filter(celltype != 0)

uptake.pb_ssc<- uptake %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= ssc_a, y = pbx8)) + 
  geom_bin2d(bins = 200, aes(fill = stat(ndensity))) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A", guide = guide_colorbar(frame.colour = "black")) + 
  geom_text(data = labels, aes(label = celltype, col = celltype),
             size = 3, fontface = "bold") +
  scale_color_discrete(guide = F) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  scale_x_continuous(name = "SSC", breaks = c(100e3, 200e3), 
                     labels = c("100K", "200K")) + 
  scale_y_continuous(name = "Pacific Blue", limits = c(2,7)) + 
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA), 
        legend.position = "bottom")
#uptake.pb_ssc
uptake.pb_fsc<- uptake %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= fsc_a, y = pbx8)) + 
  geom_bin2d(bins = 200, aes(fill = stat(ndensity))) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A", guide = guide_colorbar(frame.colour = "black")) + 
  geom_text(data = labels, aes(label = celltype, color = celltype),
             size = 3, fontface = "bold",  guide = F) +  
  theme_classic() + 
  scale_color_discrete(guide = F) + 
  scale_x_continuous(name = "FSC", breaks = c(50e3, 100e3), 
                     labels = c("50K", "100K")) + 
  scale_y_continuous(name = "Pacific Blue", limits = c(2,7)) + 
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA), 
        legend.position = "bottom")

uptake.pb_750<- uptake %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= alexa750, y = pbx8)) + 
  geom_bin2d(bins = 200, aes(fill = stat(ndensity))) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A", guide = guide_colorbar(frame.colour = "black")) + 
  geom_text(data = labels, aes(label = celltype, col = celltype),
             size = 3, fontface = "bold", guide = F) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Alexa-750") + 
  scale_y_continuous(name = "Pacific Blue", limits = c(2,7)) + 
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA), 
        legend.position = "bottom")

uptake.hist <- uptake %>%
  mutate(celltype = factor(uptake.cl + 1, levels = c("2","3", "4", "1", "0"))) %>%
  mutate(celltype = fct_rev(celltype)) %>%
  filter(celltype != 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= pbx8, fill = celltype)) + 
  geom_histogram(bins = 200, aes(y = stat(count)/max(count))) + 
  #geom_density(aes(group = 1, y = stat(ndensity)), fill = NA, col = "black", n = 200) +

uptake.hist

                  legend.position = "none"),
```

```{r}
                      predictors = c("fsc_a", "ssc_a", "alexa750", "ssc_w", "fsc_w", "live_dead"), 
                      nfold = 2, 
                      ncross = 3,

stained %>% select(pox6, pbx8) %>%
  mutate(which = 'Before') %>%
  bind_rows(bind_cols(pb.mod.stained$fcb, po.mod.stained$fcb) %>% mutate(which = 'After')) %>%

  ggplot(aes(x= pox6, y = pbx8)) +

  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A", guide = guide_colorbar(frame.colour = "black")) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Pacific Orange", limits = c(0,8)) + 
  scale_y_continuous(name = "Pacific Blue", limits = c(0,8)) + 
  coord_fixed() + 
  facet_wrap(which~., nrow = 1) +
  theme_bw() + 
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA), 
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        legend.position = "none")
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.


```{r}
all.dilutions <- 1/(1.33^(0:20))

Ax700 <- all.dilutions[all.dilutions > 0.051]
Ax750 <- all.dilutions[all.dilutions > 0.026]
fullgrid <- expand.grid(Ax700, Ax750)
colnames(fullgrid) <- c("Ax700", "Ax750")

as_tibble(fullgrid) %>%
  mutate(ax750inax700 = Ax750/Ax700, 
         ax700inax750 = Ax700/Ax750) %>%
  filter(ax750inax700 > 0.12, 
         ax700inax750 > 0.42) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Ax700, y = Ax750)) +
  geom_point() + 
  scale_x_log10() + 
  scale_y_log10() + 
  theme_classic()



all.dilutions <- 1/(1.2^(0:20))

Ax700 <- all.dilutions[all.dilutions > 0.051]
Ax750 <- all.dilutions[all.dilutions > 0.026]
fullgrid <- expand.grid(Ax700, Ax750)
colnames(fullgrid) <- c("Ax700", "Ax750")

as_tibble(fullgrid) %>%
  mutate(ax750inax700 = Ax750/Ax700, 
         ax700inax750 = Ax700/Ax750) %>%
  filter(ax750inax700 > 0.12, 
         ax700inax750 > 0.42) %>%
  print() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Ax700, y = Ax750)) +
```
